text: the lesser prairie chicken is at the
center of a maelstrom lawsuits
regulatory battles legislative fights
the bone of contention how to protect
the threatened bird and regulate the use
of its territory in five states Kansas
New Mexico Texas Oklahoma and Colorado
lesser prairie chickens spend the mating
season on what are called Lex a lek is
kind of a dance floor where the male's
come to strut and attract a mate in the
blonde fairy grasses the male's show off
their skills feather flapping foot
stomping air sac bulging the females
gather around the lek watching the most
impressive males will breed with up to
80 percent of the females that means
many males leave the dance floor
frustrated and waiting to try again next
year
